HeroShowcaseClientContent.description: Discover exquisitely crafted bath and home solutions that blend timeless design with modern functionality.

aboutUs.title: ABOUT US
aboutUs.intro: VIVENZA is the new commercial brand of GRUPOSIETE for Bath and Ceramic Showrooms.
aboutUs.paragraph1: GRUPOSIETE is a company that markets and distributes materials for Heating, Plumbing, Air Conditioning, Sanitary Ware, Civil Works, Construction Materials, and Renewable Energies through points of sale for professionals and Bath and Ceramic Showrooms.
aboutUs.paragraph2: GRUPOSIETE, through VIVENZA, offers comprehensive and innovative solutions to create designer spaces. In our 12 showrooms, you can explore different complete environments that will inspire you.
aboutUs.paragraph3: Our team of experts will provide you with a unique experience with personalized attention and tailor-made solutions adapted to your style.

locationsTeaser.title: Visit Our Showrooms
locationsTeaser.description: Experience Vivenza quality firsthand at our showroom locations.

ContactPage.title: Get in Touch
ContactPage.description: We'd love to hear from you. Whether you have a question about our products, need assistance, or just want to share your feedback, please contact us.

LocationsPage.title: Our Showrooms
LocationsPage.description: Visit us to experience Vivenza quality and get expert advice. Find your nearest showroom:
